item.title: 2025-03-14: Crossover Art Support and more Art
item.description:
Site

Crossover art support! Not complete but it's on its way. Plan is have have all crossover art appear in the crossover art section and also in any fandom it's part of. Right now it's in one or the other. Also, the Art page's fandom description is a little smaller. And a big dump of artwork! And fixed Father's OC page to grab the right image and played with using asides for OC pages.

More Updates.

item.title: 2025-01-18: New Asura's Wrath artwork section and new NTWEWY artwork
item.description:
Site

New Artwork section for Asura's Wrath. Asura's Wrath artwork is mostly, if not all, screenshot redraws. An incredibly beautiful game that was fun to practice lighting and metal work with. Also added descriptions for each fandom in the art table to explain what I focused on for that fandom.

More Updates.

item.title: 2025-01-12: Started Porting Analysis Posts for TWEWY
item.description:
Site

New Analysis Section! Will slowly add to it over time. Currently has one for TWEWY & NTWEWY. Might organize them a differently in the future. Artwork pages now has headers and separate section for reference images.

More Updates.
